content.title: Map Services to UI Elements
content.body:
1. From the top-right corner of the Action Editor canvas, select Design View.
  2. Navigate to Invoke Service name: EmployeeServices$employees$get > Callback > IF employees.opstatus is equal to 0 and select Add Mapping.
    Mapping Editor opens on the right pane of the Action Editor.
  3. On the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Services > Service – EmployeeServices$employees$get
  4. On the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Forms > frmList > Segment-employeeSegment > masterdatamap.
